fields.description: The error code that categorizes the error type of the Fail activity. It can be dynamic content that's evaluated to a non empty/blank string at runtime. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ErrorCode

fields.description: The error message that surfaced in the Fail activity. It can be dynamic content that's evaluated to a non empty/blank string at runtime. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Message
